awards.text: Nominated for 2 Primetime Emmys. Another 1 win & 2 nominations.

fullplot: Aliens pretending to be friendly come to Earth and are received openly. The aliens have masqueraded themselves to look just like humans. When it is discovered that the aliens' planet is dying and that they have come to rape the Earth of its natural resources, the war for Earth begins. An important key to the humans' success is distinguishing their own from who the aliens are.
plot: When aliens come to Earth to ask for our help, a few suspicious humans discover their horrific true intentions and prepare to resist.
title: V
